{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRK54G}} WRK54G v1.0 serial numbers appear to start with '''CGT0'''. A full sample serial number is CGT00D918733. "3762-14147006" is silkscreened on the board. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRK54G_v1.0}} {{WiFiCert|W002005|02/27/2004}} ==Images== ===from [[User:M86]]=== File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 angled.jpg|angled shot File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 back.jpg|back File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 bottom.jpg|bottom File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 serial label.jpg|model, serial, MAC label [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 board top.jpg|board top File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 flash.jpg|MX29LV160BTTC-90 Flash File:Linksys WRK54G v1.0 CPU.jpg|88W8510 CPU [[Has images::internal| ]]
